title: Just got charged twice for purchasing a champion
body: I just went to the store with ~7900 IP, purchased Heimerdinger for 3150, and now my account is showing that I only have 1664 IP. I think I just got charged twice for buying him as no other purchases were made. 7900-(3150x2)=1600. Has anybody else had this issue?

replies.body: I think it's just a client glitch, it's happened to me before but after a few minutes it goes back to what it should.
Yup, should be a visual issue. If it's not, shoot a ticket to Player Support and we can fix the issue that way!
